data.eml:eml: Two new species in the phyllophorid genus Massinium (Echinodermata: Holothuroidea) with redescription of Massinium magnum

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Samyn, Yves, Thandar, Ahmed S. (2010): Two new species in the phyllophorid genus Massinium (Echinodermata: Holothuroidea) with redescription of Massinium magnum. Zootaxa 2399: 1-19, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.194047
